dogFacts.fact: Dogs have wet noses because it helps to absorb scent chemicals.

Dalmatians are born completely white and develop their spots as they grow older.
Dogs have a sense of time and can distinguish between a hour and five hours.
A dog's sense of smell is about 1,000 times stronger than a human's sense of smell.

Puppies are born blind, deaf, and toothless.

Dogs are able to see in color, but their color vision is not as vivid as a human's.

A group of Pugs is called a grumble.
